alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rio Blanco County through 415 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 27 miles southeast of Rangely, or 46 miles north of Grand Junction, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Rio Blanco County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
